title: Epic SKin Shard with no picture of champ/skin
body: Earlier today I finally earned my last key fragment to open a chest. Following this I immediately went to my loot inventory and opened my chest. When the chest opened it revealed that I had gotten an epic skin shard but it did not show the skin or champ that it belongs to. Does anybody know why this occurred or how I can find out what champ it is for?

replies.body: I also got that same exact problem earlier today..{{champion:22}}
